code: import React from'react';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Description from'./Description';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(props){const[datann,setdata]=useState([{content:"loading..",title:"loading..",date:"hh"}]);const[idx,setidx]=useState(0);const call=async()=>{let data=await fetch('https://blog-app-api-804s.onrender.com/api/posts');let datan=await data.json();setdata(datan.data);props.setpostdata(datan.data);console.log(datan.data);let date=datan.data[0].date;let id=datan.data[0]._id;for(let i=0;i<datan.data.length;i++){if(datan.data[i].date>date){date=datan.data[i].date;id=datan.data[i]._id;}}for(let i=0;i<datan.data.length;i++){if(datan.data[i]._id==id){setidx(i);props.setLatestId(id);return;}}};useEffect(()=>{call();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"homepage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"homeimage",src:datann[idx].img}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Description,{title:datann[idx].title,name:"Kartik Ranaut",Date:datann[idx].date,nature:datann[idx].nature})]});}
